scripts.start: node-sass assets/sass/home.sass -o assets/css/home.css && node-sass assets/sass/me.sass -o assets/css/me.css && node-sass assets/sass/motivation.sass -o assets/css/motivation.css && node server.js
scripts.sass:prod: node-sass assets/sass/home.sass -o assets/css/home.css && node-sass assets/sass/me.sass -o assets/css/me.css && node-sass assets/sass/motivation.sass -o assets/css/motivation.css
